alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Divide Lake to 15 miles northwest of Henrys Lake to 11 miles north of Kilgore. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Targhee Pass, Raynolds Pass, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village and Red Rock Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
